metadata.title: CVE-2024-0409 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description:
SELinux context corruption

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-0409` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xnest - 2:21.1.7-1ubuntu3.6
xorg-server-source - 2:21.1.7-1ubuntu3.6
xserver-common - 2:21.1.7-1ubuntu3.6
xserver-xephyr - 2:21.1.7-1ubuntu3.6
xserver-xorg-core - 2:21.1.7-1ubuntu3.6
xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:21.1.7-1ubuntu3.6
xvfb - 2:21.1.7-1ubuntu3.6
No subscription required

xwayland - 2:22.1.8-1ubuntu1.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:21.1.7-1ubuntu3.6').
xwayland package in lunar was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:22.1.8-1ubuntu1.4').
